data.name: Food Wars! The Third Plate: Challenging the Elite Ten
data.short_description: Soma finds out that Totsuki has a school festival that happens at the end of autumn called the Moon Festival. Soma is told by the 8th seat of the Elite Ten, Kuga, that if he’s able to beat him in any dish there, he’ll accept a Shokugeki from him and Soma decides to enter the Moon Festival so...
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
